1.vid: /9/95/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 1 Version 3.360p.mp4

2.text: Get your eggs and put them into the muffin tin.
2.vid: /9/94/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Once at temperature, put your muffin tin into the oven and set your timer for 30 minutes.
3.vid: /0/03/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Before time is up, prepare a bowl of ice water large enough to contain the eggs.
4.vid: /c/c4/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Immediately put the eggs in the ice water once they are removed from the oven.
5.vid: /e/e9/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Remove them from the water and peel them.
6.vid: /4/4d/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4
